trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Toto umožňuje vytvárať a odosielať fotografie.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you unlock the app.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: Stránky, ktoré navštevujete, môžu požiadať o prezradenie vašej polohy.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Location When In Use Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Toto umožňuje tvoriť a nahrávať videá.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Microphone Usage Description

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Toto umožňuje ukladať a nahrávať fotografie.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Photo Library Additions Usage Description
This is the menu item that appears when you long press the Focus icon on the phone home screen.
Title of the Erase intent.

trans-unit.source: Clear your entire browsing session history, passwords, cookies anytime with a single tap.
trans-unit.target: Kedykoľvek si vyčistite celú históriu prehliadania, heslá a cookies. Stačí vám na to jedno ťuknutie.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'History' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the third panel 'History' in the First Run tour.
Button to go to the next card in Focus onboarding.

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose a different search engine.
trans-unit.target: Hľadáte niečo iné? Vyberte si iný vyhľadávací modul.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.
Button to skip onboarding in Focus

trans-unit.source: Take private browsing to the next level. Block ads and other content that can track you across sites and bog down page load times.
trans-unit.target: Súkromné prehliadanie na úplne inej úrovni. Blokujte reklamy a ostatný obsah, ktorý vás môže sledovať naprieč stránkami.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Posuňte svoje súkromie na vyššiu úroveň
trans-unit.note: Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.
Button on About screen

trans-unit.source: %@ is produced by Mozilla. Our mission is to foster a healthy, open Internet.
trans-unit.target: %@ vyvíja Mozilla. Naša misia je podporovať zdravý a otvorený internet.
trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Search and browse right in the app

trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Block trackers (or update settings to allow trackers)

trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Erase to delete cookies as well as search and browsing history

trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.note: Label on About screen

trans-unit.source: Automatically block online trackers while you browse. Then tap to erase visited pages, searches, cookies and passwords from your device.
trans-unit.target: Automaticky počas prehliadania blokujte sledovacie prvky. Potom jedným ťuknutím z vášho zariadenia vymažte zoznam navštívených stránok, výsledky vyhľadávania, cookies a heslá.
trans-unit.note: Message label on the first run screen
Message label on the first run screen
Title for the loading screen when the handoff of clipboard delays Focus launch. “Handoff” should not be localized, see https://support.apple.com/HT204681
First label for product description on the home screen
Second label for product description on the home screen
Button label used to close a menu that displays as a popup.

trans-unit.source: Erase your browsing history, passwords, cookies, and prevent unwanted ads from following you in a simple click!
trans-unit.target: Vymažte svoju históriu prehliadania, heslá, súbory cookie a zabráňte tomu, aby vás prenasledovali nechcené reklamy, a to jednoduchým kliknutím!
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of history section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of history section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: %@ is a dedicated privacy browser with tracking protection and content blocking.
trans-unit.target: %@ je prehliadač špecializovaný na ochranu súkromia s automatickou ochranou pred sledovaním a blokovaním reklám.
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of incognito section from onboarding screen. Placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).
Text for a label that indicates the title of incognito section from onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Configure settings so you can decide how much or how little you share.

trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the description of protection section from onboarding screen.
Text for a label that indicates the title of protection section from onboarding screen.

Title for What's new screen
Title for settings section to enable different Siri Shortcuts.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to add the site to Shortcuts
Toast displayed to the user after adding the item to the Shortcuts.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the find in page menu

Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open a page in Firefox but doesn’t have it installed. This string will not wrap in the interface. Instead, it will truncate. To prevent this, please keep the localized string to 18 or fewer characters. If your string runs longer than 18 characters, you can use 'Get Firefox' as the basis for your string. However, if at all possible, we’d like to signal to the user that they will be going to the App Store and installing the application from there. That is why we are using Get and App in the en-US string.
Title for the share menu where users can take actions for the current website they are on.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to remove the site from Shortcuts
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to reload the site as a desktop
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to reload the site as a mobile device
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website in the Chrome app.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website in the default browser.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to open the current website in the Firefox app.
Text for the share menu option when a user wants to share the current website they are on through another app.
Text for the long press on a shortcut option in context menu.
Text for the long press on a shortcut rename option in context menu.
Text for the placeholder textfield on rename shortcut alert.
Text for the rename shortcut alert primary action.
Text for the rename shortcut alert secondary action.

trans-unit.source: Read more about this and other updates to %@.

trans-unit.source: Why yes, we do have a fresh new look!

trans-unit.target: Akcie stránky > Verzia stránky pre počítače

trans-unit.source: Want to see the full desktop version of a site?

trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for request desktop tip.

Text for a label that indicates the description for share trackers tip. The placeholder is the number of trackers blocked. Only shown when there are more than 10 trackers blocked. For locales where we would need plural support, please feel free to translate this string as `Trackers blocked so far: %@` instead.
Text for a label that indicates the title for share trackers tip. The placeholder is replaced with the long product name (Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar).

trans-unit.source: Create shortcuts to the sites you visit most:

trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for shortcuts tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri erase tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri erase tip. The placeholder is replaced with the long product name (Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar).
Text for a label that indicates the description for siri favorite tip. The shortcut in this context is the iOS Siri Shortcut, not a Focus website shortcut.
Text for a label that indicates the title for siri favorite tip.
Text for a label that indicates the description for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.source: Site missing content or acting strange?
trans-unit.target: Chýba na stránke obsah alebo sa správa zvláštne?
trans-unit.note: Text for a label that indicates the title for sites not working tip.

trans-unit.source: Go to Settings to manage specific privacy & security options.
trans-unit.target: Ak chcete spravovať konkrétne možnosti ochrany súkromia a zabezpečenia, prejdite do časti Nastavenia.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Context Menu icon tooltip

trans-unit.source: These default settings offer strong protection. But it’s easy to tweak the settings to meet your specific needs.
trans-unit.target: Tieto predvolené nastavenia ponúkajú silnú ochranu. Je však ľahké vyladiť nastavenia tak, aby vyhovovali vašim špecifickým potrebám.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: %@ stopped this site from spying on you. Tap the shield for info on what we blocked.
trans-unit.target: %@ zabránil tejto stránke, aby vás špehovala. Ťuknutím na štít získate informácie o tom, čo sme zablokovali.
trans-unit.note: This is the body text that is displayed for the Shield icon tooltip. Where placeholder can be (Focus or Klar).

trans-unit.source: Tap the trash anytime to remove all traces of your current session.
trans-unit.target: Ťuknutím na kôš kedykoľvek odstránite všetky stopy vašej aktuálnej relácie.

This is the title text that is displayed for the Privacy tooltip

trans-unit.source: Protections are OFF for this session

trans-unit.source: Disable until you close %@ or tap ERASE.

Text for the toggle that enables/disables tracking protection.

trans-unit.source: Keep your data to yourself. %@ protects you from many of the most common trackers that follow what you do online.
trans-unit.target: %@ vás chráni pred mnohými sledovacími prvkami, ktoré zbierajú informácie o tom, čo robíte na internete.
trans-unit.note: General description of tracking protection settings, which is displayed underneath the trackers preferences in Settings. Placeholder is either Firefox Focus or Firefox Klar
Text for tracking protection screen showing the number of trackers blocked since the app install. The placeholder is replaced with the install date of the application.

trans-unit.target: Sledovacie prvky a skripty na zablokovanie
trans-unit.note: Text for the header of trackers section from Tracking Protection.
The title of the Licenses setting in the settings that Focus shows in the global iOS Settings app.
